title.narrative: Programa de Rehabilitación del Sistema de Abastecimiento de Agua de Linden

description.narrative: The general objective of the proposed operation is to improve efficiency, quality and sustainability of the potable water services provided in Linden. The specific objectives are to: (i) decrease energy use, improve pressure, quality and continuity of the water supply system; (ii) reduce the level of Non Revenue Water (NRW); and (iii) strengthen GWI performance in terms of operation and maintenance practices.

el objetivo general de la operación propuesta es mejorar la eficiencia, calidad y sostenibilidad de los servicios de agua potable provistas en Linden. los objetivos específicos son: (i) disminuir el consumo de energía, mejorar la presión, la calidad y la continuidad del sistema de abastecimiento de agua, (ii) reducir el nivel de agua no contabilizada (NRW), y (iii) fortalecer el desempeño de GWI en términos de operación y prácticas de mantenimiento.

activity-description.narrative: 4 Km of transmission mains rehabilitated towards reducing the level of non revenue water (NRW)
6km of distribution network have been rehabilitated towards improving the efficiency, quality and sustainability of the potable water services provided in Linden. 1
6km of distribution network have been rehabilitated towards improving the efficiency, quality and sustainability of the potable water services provided in Linden.
7km of transmission mains built towards reducing the level of non revenue water (NRW)
